document_data.caption: A [[wizard]] casts prismatic eye at a [[barbed devil]].
document_data.name: Prismatic Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''''Prismatic eye''''' was an [[alteration]] and [[evocation]] [[spell]] that caused a visible, directable orb, very much resembling a ''[[wizard eye]]'', to appear over the shoulder of the caster.
document_data.Effects:
The eye could be commanded by the caster to travel around and share its vision with them. At regular intervals,

The prismatic eye could be destroyed by normal, non-magical means.
document_data.Components: The material components of this spell were a dried, or preserved, eyeball and a polished slice of abalone, [[oyster]], or tortoise shell.
